ComicInfo.Title: The Judgment of Tyr; Baptism of Fire!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Judgment of Tyr: Tyr travels to Earth to battle Thor for the hand of Sif.
Baptism of Fire!: The Valkyries travel to Valhalla to take it back from Hela.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:38:09. [Issue ID 35754]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Doug Moench,Mark Gruenwald,Ralph Macchio,Doug Moench,Mark Gruenwald,Ralph Macchio
